membership:
INTERFERRY is an associate member of the International Chamber of Shipping (London, UK). 
 
INTERFERRY is an observer to the European Community Shipowners Association (ECSA, Brussels, BE). 
 
INTERFERRY is an observer to HELCOM. 
 
INTERFERRY is an observer to the International Maritime Organization (IMO).
goals__remit: To represent the Ferry industry vis-à-vis the European institutions and the International Maritime Organization
